metadata.title: CVE-2016-7965 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: DokuWiki 2016-06-26a and older uses $_SERVER[HTTP_HOST] instead of thebaseurl setting as part of the password-reset URL. This can lead tophishing attacks. (A remote unauthenticated attacker can change the URL'shostname via the HTTP Host header.) The vulnerability can be triggered onlyif the Host header is not part of the web server routing process (e.g., ifseveral domains are served by the same web server).

criterions.comment: dokuwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
